title: Strengthening e-Learning Practice Competencies: Collaborative Design Project-Based iSTEM Integrated Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge in Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics (STEM) fields
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can design projects that integrate STEM knowledge for real-world problem-solving.
Learners can perform model-based inquiry and design processes using VR/simulation tools.
Learners can complete a problem-centered learning (PCL) process in collaboration with interdisciplinary team members.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
